remixlab.proscene

Enum Scene.MouseAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Scene.MouseAction>
      • remixlab.proscene.Scene.MouseAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Scene.MouseAction>
    Enclosing class:
    Scene

    public static enum Scene.MouseAction
extends java.lang.Enum<Scene.MouseAction>
    This enum defines mouse actions (click + drag) to be binded to the mouse. Actions are defined here, but bindings are defined at the CameraProfile level, i.e., the scene acts like a bridge between the CameraProfile and proscene low-level classes.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      DRIVE
      Drive (camera or interactive drivable frame).
      LOOK_AROUND
      Look around with frame (camera or interactive drivable frame).
      MOVE_BACKWARD
      move backward frame (camera or interactive frame).
      MOVE_FORWARD
      Move forward frame (camera or interactive frame).
      NO_MOUSE_ACTION
      No mouse action.
      ROLL
      Roll frame (camera or interactive drivable frame).
      ROTATE
      Rotate frame (camera or interactive frame.
      SCREEN_ROTATE
      Screen rotate (camera or interactive frame).
      SCREEN_TRANSLATE
      Screen translate frame (camera or interactive frame).
      TRANSLATE
      Translate frame (camera or interactive frame).
      ZOOM
      Zoom.
      ZOOM_ON_REGION
      Zoom on region (camera or interactive drivable frame).
